sections.paragraph: இது, இவள், இப்படி, யாது, அவர்களை, அவள், இவை, அது, அவர்கள், இந்த, இங்கே. இவ்வாறு, ஒத்த, அப்படிப்பட்ட, அதினால், அதற்க்கா, நிமித்தம், - பிரதி பெயர்ச்சொல்
this, this one, here, which, this.that, the one.the other, such
(b) (used in apposition to a substantive) this
2) on these conditions, herewith, thus provided, by, through this, for this cause, in this matter
4) as follows, things such as these, accordingly, to that effect, in like manner, thus and thus
5) from here, hence, on one side.on the other side
7) in spite of this, which, whence, how

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Irregular feminine of H2089; this (often used adverbially): - hereby (-in, -with), it, likewise, the one (other, same), she, so (much), such (deed), that, therefore, these, this (thing), thus.
Cognate: H2063, H2088
